title: Clannad: After Story - Mou Hitotsu no Sekai, Kyou-hen
title_en: Clannad After Story: Another World, Kyou Chapter
title_jp: クラナド　アフターストーリー　もうひとつの世界　杏編
synopsis: Included in the 8th and final DVD of Clannad ~After Story~ is an extra episode set in an alternate universe. Here, Fujibayashi Kyou is the main heroine in place of Furukawa Nagisa.
